original: Paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo anārammaṇoti?
analyzed: paññā paññindriyam paññā balam sammādiṭṭhi dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ anārammaṇaḥ ti

original: paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo sārammaṇoti?
analyzed: paññā paññindriyam paññā balam sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgo sa ārammaṇaḥ ti
vedanā kkhandho saññā kkhandho viññāṇa kkhandho anārammaṇaḥ ti
paññā saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannā anārammaṇā ati
paññā saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannā sa ārammaṇā ti
ñāṇam saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannam sa ārammaṇanti

original: Ñāṇaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, paññā saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā sārammaṇāti?
analyzed: ñāṇam saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannam anārammaṇa paññā saṅkhāra kkhandha pariyāpannā sa ārammaṇā ti
saṅkhāra kkhandho ekadesaḥ sārammaṇaḥ ekadesaḥ anārammaṇaḥ ti
saṅkhāra kkhandho ekadesaḥ sārammaṇaḥ ekadesaḥ anārammaṇaḥ ti

original: Vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho viññāṇakkhandho ekadeso sārammaṇo ekadeso anārammaṇoti?
analyzed: vedanā kkhandho saññā kkhandho viññāṇa kkhandho ekadesaḥ sārammaṇaḥ ekadesaḥ anārammaṇaḥ ti
arahā cakkhu viññāṇa samaṅgī ñāṇī iti vattabbaḥ ti
arahā cakkhu viññāṇa samaṅgī paññavā ati vattabbo ti
